About

About Me

Hello, My name is Marley Boone. I was Born and raised on the North-side of Indianpolis and I recently Graduated from Eleven Fifty Acedemy.

Through Eleven Fifty Acedomy I was able to truly discover my passion for coding. Although I am young I work hard and learning is one of my greatest passions.

My Code and more Projects can be found at Github

My Portfolio

Projects created while at Eleven fifty

Book Lover

A functioning API that allows users to Find and leave reviews on books they have read and discover new books they have yet to read. This was a team project and was built by Ben Chamness, Eric Lejuenese and I.

To-Gather

A functioning MVC that allows users to Create and find Events near them (based on location) that they might enjoy.

Fred - Css Creature

Fred was built using Css & HTML. Although he was difficult to make perfect he sure was a lot of fun to make!
